oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Distinguished Service Medal certificate
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Distinguished Service Medal certificate issued to Gen. George H. Harries for his work as a member of Inter-Allied Commission for Repatriation of Allied Prisoners of War. Signed by Robert C. Davis, Adjutant General, and Dwight R. Davis, Secretary of War. The certificate is from a scapbook of photographs and documents about Harries. Although the certificate is dated 1925, a memo from the Adjutant General's Office, dated 02/07/1920, lists Harries as a recipient of the Distinguished Service Medal.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
